meanings.definition: A person who engages in spoofing.
meanings.sent1: The spoofers were causing trouble online.
meanings.sent2: The team of spoofers was skilled at tricking others.
meanings.sent3: The spoofers decided to play a harmless prank on their friend.
meanings.sent4: The spoofers were like mischievous elves in the digital world.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the spoofers, they can be quite cunning.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of spoofers at the convention.
meanings.sent2: The spoofers gathered to share their latest techniques.
meanings.sent3: The spoofers exchanged knowing glances as they planned their next move.
meanings.sent4: The spoofers moved in unison, like a flock of birds.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with laughter as the spoofers shared their stories.
